SERIAL_NO_CONTRACT("PC"),

select contract_id, contract_code, serial_no, title, sign_date, type, contract_status,approval_status, approval_process, approval_process_id, cycle, pay_type, party_a_id, party_a_name, party_a_principal, party_b_id, party_b_name, party_b_principal, start_date, end_date,approval_start_date, approval_end_date, summary, terms, file_url, group_id,company_id, is_draft, summation, create_id, create_name, create_time, effective_time, termination_time, sign_place, attachment1_name, attachment1, attachment2_name, attachment2, attachment3_name, attachment3, attachment4_name, attachment4, attachment5_name, attachment5 from t_contract

select contract_id, contract_code, serial_no, title, sign_date, type, contract_status,approval_status, approval_process, approval_process_id, cycle, pay_type, party_a_id, party_a_name, party_a_principal, party_b_id, party_b_name, party_b_principal, start_date, end_date,approval_start_date, approval_end_date, summary, terms, file_url, group_id,company_id, is_draft, summation, create_id, create_name, create_time, effective_time, termination_time, sign_place, attachment1_name, attachment1, attachment2_name, attachment2, attachment3_name, attachment3, attachment4_name, attachment4, attachment5_name, attachment5 from t_contract
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and (title like concat('%',#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or serial_no like concat('%',#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and contract_code like concat('%',#{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and start_date >= #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= start_date
and contract_status = #{contractStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
and group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and approval_status = #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT} and is_draft=1
and is_draft=0
create_time > concat(#{createBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},' 00:00:00')
and create_time < concat(#{createEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},' 23:59:59')
order by
create_time
start_date
end_date
desc
mapper.update: update t_contract set approval_status = #{arg2}, approval_end_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where contract_id = #{arg0} and company_id = #{arg1}

update t_contract
contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_date = #{signDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
contract_status = #{contractStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
approval_status = #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
approval_process = null, approval_process_id = null, approval_start_date = null,
approval_process = #{approvalProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_process_id = #{approvalProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cycle = #{cycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
party_a_id = #{partyAId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
party_a_name = #{partyAName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
party_a_principal = #{partyAPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
party_b_id = #{partyBId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
party_b_name = #{partyBName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
party_b_principal = #{partyBPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approval_start_date = #{approvalStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approval_end_date = #{approvalEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
terms = #{terms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_draft = #{isDraft,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
summation = #{summation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
termination_time = #{terminationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sign_place = #{signPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment1_name = #{attachment1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment1 = #{attachment1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment2_name = #{attachment2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment2 = #{attachment2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment3_name = #{attachment3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment3 = #{attachment3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment4_name = #{attachment4Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment4 = #{attachment4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment5_name = #{attachment5Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment5 = #{attachment5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
